22  ThreInstr::ThreInstr(Task * f, const string& th, char *n)
23  : Instr(f, n), _endEvt(this), _threEvt(f, this), _th(th)
24  {}
25 
26  Instr* ThreInstr::createInstance(vector<string> &par)
27  {
28  return new ThreInstr(dynamic_cast<Task*>(Entity::_find(par[1])), par[0]);
29  }
30 
31  void ThreInstr::endRun()
32  {
33  _endEvt.drop();
34  _threEvt.drop();
35  }
36 
37  void ThreInstr::schedule()
38  {
39  DBGENTER(_INSTR_DBG_LEV);
40  DBGPRINT("Scheduling ThreInstr named: " << getName());
41 
42  _endEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime());
43 
44 
45  }
46 
47  void ThreInstr::deschedule()
48  {
49  DBGTAG(_INSTR_DBG_LEV,"ThreInstr::deschedule()");
50  _endEvt.drop();
51  }
52 
53  void ThreInstr::setTrace(Trace *t)
54  {
55  _endEvt.addTrace(t);
56  _threEvt.addTrace(t);
57  }
58 
59  void ThreInstr::onEnd()
60  {
61  DBGENTER(_INSTR_DBG_LEV);
62 
63  DBGPRINT("Ending ThreInstr named: " << getName());
64 
65  _father->onInstrEnd();
66 
67  RTKernel *k = dynamic_cast<RTKernel *>(_father->getKernel());
68 
69  if (k == NULL) throw BaseExc("Kernel not found!");
70 
71  DBGPRINT("Before lowing threshold for task " << _father->getName());
72 
73  k->setThreshold(0);
74  k->enableThreshold();
75 
76  DBGPRINT("After lowing threshold for task " << _father->getName());
77 
78  _threEvt.process();
79 
80 
81 
82  }
83 
84 }
